name: 計算共形幾何（一）
comment: 本課程為科學計算學分學程之選修課程，預計於108學年度公告修習要點。
description: 本課程探討基於共形幾何所發展的數值演算法。在「計算共形幾何（一）」中，我們將介紹共形幾何及其相關數值演算法，進而將之應用於解決3D影像處理的問題。
goals: 培養應用數學解決問題的能力
以高觀點詮釋數學與其他學科連結
syllabus:
1.        Background and Recent Development of Computational Conformal Geometry (twoweeks)

2.        Homotopy Groups (two weeks)

3.        Simplicial Homology and Cohomology (two weeks)

4.        Topological Algorithms (two weeks)

5.        Harmonic Mappings (two weeks)

6.        Students' Midterm Reports (one week)

7.        Conformal Mappings (two weeks)

8.        Surface Registration and Morphing (two weeks)

9.        Exterior Differential Calculus (two weeks)

10.    Students' Final Reports (one week)

methodologies.note: 講授課程內容並讓學生同步實作程式

grading.note: 研讀相關書籍、近期及重要相關論文
